movies.title: Nadia: The Secret of Fuzzy
movies.originalTitle: Fushigi no umi no Nadia: Gekijô-yô orijinaru-ban
movies.plot: Fans of Nadia and Jean find them reunited through the mysterious blond girl Fuzzy so they can save the day. Girgar is bent on world domination through frightening new science and a personal army and it is up to the trio to prevent war as a prerequisite to the enemy's world domination.
movies.simplePlot: Fans of Nadia and Jean find them reunited through the mysterious blond girl Fuzzy so they can save the day. Girgar is bent on world domination through frightening new science and a personal...

biography.bio: Yoshino Takamori was born on November 23, 1963 in Chiba, Japan as Yoshino Matsui. She is an actress, known for Nadia: The Secret of Blue Water (1990), Nadia: The Secret of Fuzzy (1991) and Project A-Ko (1986).
biography.name: Yoshino Takamori

biography.bio: Noriko Hidaka was born on May 31, 1962 in Tokyo, Japan as Noriko Nagai. She is an actress, known for My Neighbor Totoro (1988), The Adventures of Peter Pan (1989) and Nadia: The Secret of Blue Water (1990).
biography.name: Noriko Hidaka

biography.bio: Kumiko Takizawa was born on August 21, 1952. She is an actress, known for Super Dimension Century Orguss (1983), Nadia: The Secret of Blue Water (1990) and Le merveilleux voyage de Nils Holgersson au pays des oies sauvages (1980).
biography.name: Kumiko Takizawa

biography.bio: Ken'yû Horiuchi was born on July 30, 1957 in Shizuoka, Japan. He is an actor, known for Naruto: Shippûden (2007), Bubblegum Crisis (1987) and Redline (2009).
biography.name: Ken'yû Horiuchi

biography.bio: Toshiharu Sakurai was born on July 3, 1964 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Nadia: The Secret of Blue Water (1990), Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Legend of the Supermutants (1996) and Dragon League (1993).
biography.name: Toshiharu Sakurai

biography.bio: Tsukasa Itô was born on February 21, 1967 in Shibuya-ku, Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Mikan no taikyoku (1982), Chiisana koi no monogatari: Chicchi to Sarî hatsukoi no shiki (1984) and Nadia: The Secret of Fuzzy (1991).
biography.name: Tsukasa Itô

biography.bio: Chikao Ohtsuka was born on July 5, 1929 in Tokyo, Japan. He was an actor, known for One Piece (1999), Fist of the North Star (1986) and Sherlock Hound (1984). He died on January 15, 2015 in Tokyo.
biography.name: Chikao Ohtsuka

biography.bio: Tamio Ôki was born on January 2, 1928 in Tokyo, Japan as Tamio Ooki. He is an actor, known for Ghost in the Shell (1995), Ghost in the Shell 2: Innocence (2004) and Les enfants loups, Ame & Yuki (2012).
biography.name: Tamio Ôki

biography.bio: Shûichi Ikeda was born on December 2, 1949 in Nakano, Japan. He is an actor, known for Kenshin le Vagabond - Le Chapitre de la Mémoire (1999), Bubblegum Crisis (1987) and Mobile Suit Gundam III: Encounters in Space (1982). He is married to Sakiko Tamagawa.
biography.name: Shûichi Ikeda

biography.bio: Tesshô Genda was born on May 20, 1948 in Okayama, Japan as Yokoi Mitsuo. He is an actor, known for Akira (1988), Ghost in the Shell (1995) and Beast King GoLion (1981).
biography.name: Tesshô Genda

biography.bio: Ken'ichi Ogata was born on March 29, 1942 in Fukuoka, Japan. He is an actor, known for Lamu (1981), Inuyasha (2000) and Conan le detective (1996).
biography.name: Ken'ichi Ogata

biography.bio: Masashi Ebara was born on May 4, 1953 in Yokohama, Japan. He is an actor, known for Naruto: Shippûden (2007), Perfect Blue (1997) and Naruto (2002).
biography.name: Masashi Ebara

biography.bio: Nobuyuki Furuta was born on April 4, 1958. He is an actor, known for Castle in the Sky (1986), Appleseed (1988) and La légende de Blanche-Neige (1994).
biography.name: Nobuyuki Furuta

biography.bio: Masayuki Katô was born on January 29, 1932 in Kitakyushu, Japan. He was an actor, known for Akira (1988), The Castle of Cagliostro (1979) and Fist of the North Star (1986). He died on March 18, 1993 in Japan.
biography.name: Masayuki Katô

biography.bio: Lowell Bartholomee is an actor and writer, known for Black Metal (2013), Project: Rant (2009) and My Name Is Buttons (2002). He has been married to Ellie McBride since October 24, 2009.
biography.name: Lowell Bartholomee
